name: Modernised
author: Foggy
shortdesc: A very simple and subtle white theme with no icon backgrounds.
longdesc: A very simple and subtle white theme with no icon backgrounds. This theme works well with white backgrounds as well as dark backgrounds. Every icon was created with precision to make sure that all icons fit perfectly with the theme itself.
changelog:
• Version 1.0 Latest
  • - Initial Release with 60+ icons
